faq.aboutProduct: Everything you need to know about the product
faq.stayInLoop: Stay in the loop with everything you need to know.
faq.WhatIsHappeningHereParams: Here on Slotstat you can find 3 main branches of gambling parameters:
faq.WhatIsHappeningHereEnd: cThose parameters may defer by casinos, providers and/or games.
faq.WhatIsSlotstatContent: We do gambling sector statistics. In order to reduce our analitical work service fees, we partly share information with general public. Mainly Slotstat is a side-effect of our analitical sevices.
faq.WhatsHitRateContent: Win-spin Rate is the frequency of winning spins, for which win spin is a spin issuing a higher win than the initial bet.
faq.WhatIsRTPContent: RTP meaning is Return to Player, it's static number All casinos have their RTP. It may vary from rpovider to provider even within one casino.
faq.fluctuationContent: RTP as a parameter is static, but when it comes to real situations it’s only ideal, which casinos tend to. None of the gamblers knew current-time RTP before we ran Slotstat. But now amateur researchers may do their very own predictions about whether it's better to play a long run or a short one.

table.h1Hint: Percentage of winning spins during the last hour based on summery of published games
table.h24Hint: Percentage of winning spins during the last 24 hour based on summery of published games
table.sourceHint: Information source of statistics. 1. Casino API - 2. Slotstat AI - 3. Verified -
table.userHint: Number of users who monitor statistics
table.h1GameHint: Percentage of winning spins during the last hour
table.h24GameHint: Percentage of winning spins during the last 24 hour
table.RTPhint: RTP meaning is Return to Player, it’s static number All casinos have their RTP. It may vary from provider to provider even within one casino. RTP as a parameter is static, but when it comes to real situations it’s only ideal, which casinos tend to. None of the gamblers knew current-time RTP before we ran Slotstat. But now amateur researchers may do their very own predictions about whether it’s better to play a long run or a short one.

gamePage.Win-spinRateHint: Win spin rate is the frequency of winning spins, for which win spin is a spin issuing a higher win than the initial bet.

noStatistic: Oops, we will update statistics soon!!
